price: কিন্তু কাফিৰসকল ঔদ্ধত্য আৰু বিৰোধিতাতহে নিপতিত হৈ আছে।
arabic: بَلِ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ فِي عِزَّةٖ وَشِقَاقٖ

version.title: Assamese translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Assamese by Sh. Rafiqul-Islam Habib Ar-Rahman in 1438 H.

meta.transliteration: bali alladhīna kafarū fī ʿizzatin washiqāqin
